description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、外交家，中国工人运动领导人，中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, politician, diplomat, leader of the Chinese workers' movement, a political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former national-level deputy leader.

nodes.id: 直隶省立第四师范学校

zh-cn: 直隶省立第四师范学校

description.zh-cn: 刘宁一早年就读的学校。
description.en: The school Liu Ningyi attended in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1925年至1948年间中华民国的国家领导机构。
description.en: The national government of the Republic of China from 1925 to 1948.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的八路军在南京设立的办事机构。
description.en: The office established by the Eighth Route Army, led by the Communist Party of China, in Nanjing.

en: Central Party School of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国劳动协会理事长，后当选为中华全国总工会副主席，与刘宁一共同推动中国工会运动的统一。
description.en: Chairman of the Chinese Association of Labour, later elected as Vice Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions, who worked with Liu Ningyi to promote the unification of the Chinese trade union movement.

description.zh-cn: 国民党统治区的合法工会组织，后作为团体会员加入中华全国总工会。
description.en: A legal trade union organization in the Kuomintang-controlled areas, which later joined the All-China Federation of Trade Unions as a group member.

description.zh-cn: 国民党当局武装接收中国劳动协会重庆办事处并拘捕劳协人员的事件。
description.en: An incident where the Kuomintang authorities forcibly took over the Chongqing office of the Chinese Association of Labour and arrested its staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国各地区、各产业工会组织的全国性统一领导机关。
description.en: The national unified leading body of trade union organizations in all regions and industries of China.

en: Overseas Branches of Xinhua News Agency

description.zh-cn: 苏联共产党领导人，曾作为苏共代表团团长与中共代表团进行论争。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union who, as the head of the CPSU delegation, engaged in debates with the CCP delegation.

description.zh-cn: 中苏两党就国际共产主义运动中的问题举行会谈，双方产生激烈论争。
description.en: Talks between the CCP and CPSU on issues within the international communist movement, which involved intense debates between the two sides.

en: 11th Plenary Session of the 8th Central Committee of the CCP
International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the CCP
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
Secretariat of the Central Committee of the CCP

relationships.target: 直隶省立第四师范学校

description.zh-cn: 曾就读于直隶省立第四师范学校，并担任学生会主席。
description.en: Studied at the Fourth Provincial Normal School of Zhili and served as the president of the student union.

description.zh-cn: 1925年，刘宁一参加了当地的五卅运动。
description.en: In 1925, Liu Ningyi participated in the local May 30th Movement.

description.zh-cn: 1925年9月加入中国共产党，并长期担任党内多项重要职务。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in September 1925 and held various important positions within the party for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 曾三次被国民政府逮捕关押。
description.en: Was arrested and imprisoned by the Nationalist Government three times.

description.zh-cn: 1937年8月，经八路军南京办事处交涉，刘宁一获释。
description.en: In August 1937, Liu Ningyi was released after negotiations by the Eighth Route Army's Nanjing Office.

description.zh-cn: 1943年7月赴延安中央党校学习。
description.en: In July 1943, he went to study at the Central Party School in Yan'an.

description.zh-cn: 自1946年起，刘宁一与时任中国劳动协会理事长朱学范多次合作，共同致力于中国工会运动的统一，并一同出席国际会议、转赴解放区。
description.en: Starting from 1946, Liu Ningyi collaborated multiple times with Zhu Xuefan, then chairman of the Chinese Association of Labour, to jointly work towards the unification of the Chinese trade union movement, attending international conferences and traveling to liberated areas together.

description.zh-cn: 1946年，经周恩来批准，刘宁一帮助朱学范和中国劳协总部撤往香港。
description.en: In 1946, with Zhou Enlai's approval, Liu Ningyi helped Zhu Xuefan and the headquarters of the Chinese Association of Labour to retreat to Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 国民党当局制造了重庆“八·六”事件。
description.en: The Kuomintang authorities created the Chongqing 'August 6th' Incident.

description.zh-cn: 事件中，国民党当局武装接收中国劳动协会重庆办事处并拘捕其人员。
description.en: During the incident, Kuomintang authorities forcibly took over the Chongqing office of the Chinese Association of Labour and arrested its personnel.

description.zh-cn: 1948年8月在哈尔滨举行的第六次全国劳动大会恢复了中华全国总工会。
description.en: The Sixth National Labor Congress, held in Harbin in August 1948, re-established the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 在第六次全国劳动大会上，中国劳动协会作为团体会员加入中华全国总工会。
description.en: At the Sixth National Labor Congress, the Chinese Association of Labour joined the All-China Federation of Trade Unions as a group member.

description.zh-cn: 在欧洲工作期间，向中共中央建议并协助创办了新华社海外分社。
description.en: While working in Europe, he suggested to the CCP Central Committee and assisted in the founding of the overseas branches of Xinhua News Agency.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共代表团成员，参加了由邓小平为团长的代表团，赴莫斯科与苏共中央举行会谈。
description.en: As a member of the CCP delegation, he participated in the delegation led by Deng Xiaoping to Moscow for talks with the Central Committee of the CPSU.

description.zh-cn: 在1963年莫斯科会谈中，刘宁一作为中共代表团成员，与苏斯洛夫为首的苏共代表团就国际共产主义运动问题展开激烈论争。
description.en: During the 1963 Moscow talks, Liu Ningyi, as a member of the CCP delegation, engaged in intense debates with the CPSU delegation led by Mikhail Suslov on issues of the international communist movement.

description.zh-cn: 在1966年的中共八届十一中全会上，刘宁一被补选为中共中央书记处书记。
description.en: At the 11th Plenary Session of the 8th CCP Central Committee in 1966, Liu Ningyi was co-opted as a secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat.

position.zh-cn: 副主席、主席、党组副书记、党组书记
position.en: Vice Chairman, Chairman, Deputy Party Group Secretary, Party Group Secretary

description.zh-cn: 刘宁一曾任第一、二、三届全国人大常委会委员，并在1965年1月当选为第三届全国人大常委会副委员长兼秘书长。
description.en: Liu Ningyi served as a member of the Standing Committees of the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd National People's Congress, and was elected Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the Standing Committee of the 3rd NPC in January 1965.
